transcript:
Customer: pata nahi
Customer: kya hua cancellation kya raise hua tha hello
Customer: awaz nahi aa raha sir
Customer: aa rahi hai awaz
Executive: ha bataiye
Customer: ha ha keh raha hu ki ek bar sir se baat kariyega theek hai ki jo inko Jai Balaji ko aa raha hai acha khasa response sir aap ek bar video meet pe bhi aaoge na to main dikha dunga inko sir
Executive: wo theek hai sir video meet pe abhi to filhal possible nahi hai main ye bolunga ki dekho aap main ek bar meeting karke dekho abhi per day ka jo mamla hai isko finish kiya jaye itna time ho gaya inko business nahi mil raha hai kafi time kya dikkat hai kya pareshani hai inse directly ek bar aap baat kar lo Jai Balaji ka jahan tak baat hai dekho Jai Balaji ka jahan tak baat hai hum jante hain Jai Balaji kya karte hain aur aap aap bhi jante hain ground level pe koi Jai Balaji ka number kya hai ek bar mujhe batana number tha mere pass batana ek bar
Customer: number main number
Executive: sir detail dekho maine aapko inka website ka link bhej diya hai ye matlab recorded line pe to hum recorded line pe kisi ki detail access nahi kar sakte ha main inka website ka bhej diya hu aapko waha se aap check karke aap matlab connect kar sakte hain
Customer: ek second ruk jaiye
Customer: ha aur theek hai main Abdullah ji se kal baat baat kar leta hu Abdullah bhai se aap ek bar
Executive: sir aap ek bar na ha Abdullah sir se baat kar lo ki matlab kya issue hai matlab inquiry ya leads ke liye kuch issue hai to aap baat kar lena to fir main Abdullah sir se is cheez ka resolution de dunga inko bata bhi dunga aur catalog jo mere hand me rahega theek karne ka aur improve karke acha kar dunga sir theek na to fir dekh lenge do char din hafte din sir kya us pe feedback aata hai fir wo khud batayenge Jai Balaji jo hai na bahut sara category me kam karte hain ek hi category nahi hai unka
Executive: category bahut sara category hai inka bahut sara product
Customer: catalog ka bheja hu jo d rank me aa raha hai ek bar kal video meet me aap connect kijiyega pehle main isko theek karunga theek hai aur jo concern hai sir aap mujhe kal batao main usko matlab solve karke deta hu sir kal main apne level pe
Customer: Balaji ka to number hai hi hai mere pass theek hai main baat kar leta hu
Executive: ha baat kar lijiyega baki ji sir jo request aayi hai usko main ek bar close kar raha hu kal isko baat karke na fir mujhe batao main isko theek karwa ke de raha hu theek na
Customer: theek
Executive: ha ek na wo jayega hamara aur aapka jo discussion hua hai us pe mark kariyega sir
Customer: theek okay
Executive: theek hai okay
Customer: okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's business is not getting enough leads.

- Catalog is coming in D rank.



Resolution:

- Executive will connect with Abdullah to resolve issue.

- Executive will improve the catalog.

- Executive will fix the catalog's D rank issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to Abdullah about the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, resolution, meeting
